title: CryptoPunks Duration Discount - 12/6/2021
body:
This is a NEGATIVE CONSENT vote - if a quorum of greater than 20% is reached, the proposal will be deemed to be denied by the DAO. If no quorum is reached, the proposal will be deemed to be accepted by the DAO.

Proposal: Consistent with the Duration Discount methodology, the duration discount of CryptoPunks will be 45% for 30, 60, and 90 day collateral agreements. Duration discount will be updated in 7 days on 12/13/2021.
author: 0xC43A8A2530dCf66F458f7531a8275752d60f7689
